Pale Wolf's Lure.name: Pale Wolf's Lure
Pale Wolf's Lure.flavor: You visualize your strike tracing a path to the hunting grounds of the pale wolves, and the scent of your foe draws the predators to follow.
Pale Wolf's Lure.trigger: You make an attack roll for an at-will power
Pale Wolf's Lure.effect: If your attack hits its target, the target takes 2d10 extra damage and you conjure a pale wolf that occupies one square adjacent to the target until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that moves out of a square adjacent to the wolf takes 5 damage.

Lugos's Hunt.name: Lugos's Hunt
Lugos's Hunt.flavor: You spill your foe’s blood on the ground, fixing your enemy on your internal landscape so that hiding is impossible.
Lugos's Hunt.trigger: You make an attack roll for an at-will power
Lugos's Hunt.effect: If your attack hits its target, the target takes 4d10 extra damage. Until the end of the encounter, you ignore penalties to attack rolls against the target from concealment or total concealment if you have line of sight to the target.

Allied Terrain.name: Allied Terrain
Allied Terrain.flavor: You call upon the local spirits to guide your allies’ steps.
Allied Terrain.effect: Until the end of your next turn, allies ignore difficult terrain while within 3 squares of you, and enemies treat the space within 3 squares of you as difficult terrain.
